announcements.title: Everdew
body: - Fixed an issue where the save and load system didn't accurately save the time of day
- Fixed the day/night cycle so the day counter properly advances at midnight (12:00 AM) instead of sunrise
- Fixed an issue where day/night lighting would slowly fade in when loading a save. The environment now instantly snaps to the correct time of day
- Fixed an issue where time passed at inconsistent speeds during the day and night. The in-game clock now progresses at a steady, consistent rate through all daily phases
- Fixed a bug where shop inventory would incorrectly reset to full stock when loading a saved game. Seed quantities now persist correctly between sessions
- Turned off the Raycast for the fade out image so button clicks can be clickable during load
- Removed some of the lights in the scene that turns on at night

announcements.title: Cubo
body: - Reworked the "Grump Rock" Arena with layout improvements and gameplay adjustments
- Added a Speedrun Timer toggle in the Options menu
- The game now tracks total player deaths and displays them on the end screen
- Moved a Cooler inside the "Grump Rock" arena to improve respawn flow
- Rebalanced Crystal Crawlers (reduced health and fixed respawn delay)
- Added an additional Patrolling Shroom enemy
- Fixed a bug where standing below gold could push the player into the tilemap
- Adjusted bounce height for one of the mushrooms
- Updated an overlooked area with additional sprites and tiles for improved visuals

announcements.title: Slime Impact
body: - Player no longer dies when Ifa dies due to Geo Shield
- Ghost Bomb now explodes when touching certain objects
- Mouse no longer locks after going to the menu
- Anemo burst now boosts the player horizontally
- Ghost Bomb now affects Lucifer and minions
- Slime King no longer gets stuck on cage
- Attack hitboxes no longer trigger unintended objects
- Screen no longer goes black after Nod-Krai teleport
- Options menu no longer appears behind UI
- Mission text from dialogue no longer appears oversized
